content:
# We successfully harvested 10 iron ore, which means our inventory now contains:
# - 1 stone furnace
# - 8 wood
# - 10 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 10 iron ore

# With iron ore in hand, we can now use the stone furnace to smelt the iron ore into iron plates.
# Let's proceed to smelt the iron ore using the stone furnace.

# Set up the stone furnace and add coal as fuel.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=current_position)  # Assuming we have a method to place the furnace
add_fuel(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=5)  # Add 5 coal to the furnace
add_item_to_furnace(Prototype.StoneFurnace, item=Resource.IronOre, quantity=10)  # Add 10 iron ore to the furnace

print(f"Furnace setup completed. Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
